Description: The following statement contains a magic number: using (var reader = new StreamReader("../../students.txt"))              {                  while (true)                  {                      var line = reader.ReadLine();                      if (line == null)                      {                          break;                      }                        var info = line.Split('|').Select(x => x.Trim()).ToArray();                      var course = info[2];                      var studentFullname = new Tuple<string' string>(info[0]' info[1]);                        if (!coursesAndStudents.ContainsKey(info[2]))                      {                          coursesAndStudents.Add(course' new List<Tuple<string' string>> { studentFullname });                      }                      else                      {                          coursesAndStudents[course].Add(studentFullname);                      }                  }              }
